word: A. T. JONES--YOU ARE NOW PAYING THE SAME ROYALTIES THAT THOSE OTHER MEN DID, AND YOU KNOW THAT IN THE ARBITRATION BETWEEN A. R. HENRY AND THIS BOARD THAT HE STOOD RIGHT HERE WHERE I AM STANDING AND MADE THIS STATEMENT WITH REFERENCE TO THE PART HE TOOK IN BRINGING ABOUT THE CHANGE THAT WAS MADE; HE SAID:--
